content.text:
# Walking on a Mountain Path in Spring

Walking on a Mountain Path in Spring () is a painting by Chinese artist Ma Yuan (-1225). It is painted on an album leaf, which also contains Emperor Ningzong of Song's poem inscribed in the upper right corner.
Mountain Path is done in Ma Yuan's One-Corner style, where most of the painting's imagery is in one corner.
